item.title: Space Force exec dodges question on alien life: ‘I’m not going to answer that’
item.description: Her comments come during a week of peculiar drone sightings across New Jersey that have left authorities baffled.

item.title: In the age of Slack and Zoom, Jensen Huang still swears by email to keep tabs on every corner of Nvidia
item.description: "I’m looking to detect the weak signals. It’s easy to pick up the strong signals, but I want to intercept them when they are weak."

item.title: Broadcom is now a $1 trillion company as stock surges 20% on AI boom
item.description: Broadcom's AI revenue grew 220% to $12.2 billion this past quarter, pushing semiconductor revenue to a record $30.1 billion.

item.title: Shark Tank judge says you don’t need money or connections to get rich: ‘The top 1,000 richest people are self-made’
item.description: John, whose net worth is estimated at $350 million, thinks you don’t need privilege to make it big.

item.title: The CEO of UnitedHealth Group says company employees have been ‘barraged by threats’
item.description: In a new op-ed Andrew Witty expressed his shock at the backlash he and his staff have received since the shooting of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thomps...
